question: Which of the following is correct about the first ionization enthalpy of alkaline earth metals?
option1: It is higher than corresponding Group 1 metals
option2: It is lower than corresponding Group 1 metals
answer: It is higher than corresponding Group 1 metals
explanation: The first ionization enthalpy of these metals is higher than corresponding Group 1 metals due to the small size of these elements compared to the corresponding alkali metals. The second ionization enthalpy of these metals is lower than corresponding alkali metals.
